articles.title: India's balance of payments may slip into $45-50 bn deficit - Economic Times
articles.description: The balance of payments (BOP) summarises all the transactions of an economy with the rest of the world across two broad heads - current account and capital account. It stood at a surplus of $47.5 billion in FY22.
articles.content: India's balance of payments is likely to slip into a $45-50 billion deficit in the current fiscal year, according to an internal assessment by the finance ministry. This order of forex outflow may ke… [+3016 chars]
